What time is it now?: gìi mooŋ lɛ́ɛo? → What time is it now?
12 AM (midnight): tɔɔn-níi bpen thîaŋ-kʉʉn → It’s midnight (12 AM)
1 AM: phǒm tʉ̀ʉn dtɔɔn dtii nɯ̀ŋ → I woke up at 1 AM
2 AM: chǎn khâo nɔɔn dtɔɔn dtii sɔ̌ɔŋ → I went to bed at 2 AM
3 AM: kháo tʉ̀ʉn dtii sǎam thúk wan → He wakes up at 3 AM every day
4 AM: phǒm tʉ̀ʉn cháo dtii sìi → I wake up at 4 AM
5 AM: mɛ̂ɛ tham aa-hǎan dtɔɔn dtii hâa → Mom cooks at 5 AM
6 AM: raw jà jer kan hòk mooŋ cháo dtrooŋ → Let’s meet at exactly 6 AM
7 AM: phɔ̂ɔ bpai wîŋ dtɔɔn jèt mooŋ cháo → Dad goes running at 7 AM
8 AM: chǎn gin khâao cháo bpɛ̀ɛt mooŋ cháo → I eat breakfast at 8 AM
9 AM: rôem tham-ngaan gâo mooŋ cháo → Work starts at 9 AM
10 AM: mii bprà-chum sìp mooŋ cháo → There’s a meeting at 10 AM
11 AM: phák thîaŋ dtɔɔn sìp èt mooŋ → Lunch break is at 11 AM
1 PM: chǎn thaan khâao bàay mooŋ → I eat at 1 PM
2 PM: chǎn maa thʉ̌ŋ bâan bàay sɔ̌ɔŋ mooŋ → I arrived home at 2 PM
3 PM: nát phóp dtɔɔn bàay săam mooŋ → The meeting is at 3 PM
4 PM: tɔɔn-níi bpen sìi mooŋ yen → It’s 4 PM
5 PM: phǒm ɔ̀ɔk jàak ŋaan hâa mooŋ yen → I leave work at 5 PM
6 PM: gin khâao yen hòk mooŋ yen → I have dinner at 6 PM
7 PM: duu thii-wii nɯ̀ŋ thûm → I watch TV at 7 PM
8 PM: nát phʉ̂an sɔ̌ɔŋ thûm → Meeting a friend at 8 PM
9 PM: àap náam sǎam thûm → I shower at 9 PM
10 PM: bpai nɔɔn sìi thûm → I go to bed at 10 PM
11 PM: àan nǎŋ-sʉ̌ʉ hâa thûm → I read at 11 PM
